nodes.text: Tales of the Jedi: The Collection PLUS The Freedon Nadd Uprising

The Star Wars: Tales of the Jedi—The Collection + The Freedon Nadd Uprising is a hardcover graphic novel collecting all 5 issues from the Tales of the Jedi: Knights of the Old Republic and 2 issues from the Tales of the Jedi: The Freedon Nadd Uprising comic series, published exclusively in the UK by Boxtree Ltd.
IN A GALAXY FAR, FAR AWAY...

"This is the weapon of a Jedi Knight... Not as clumsy or as random as a blaster. An elegant weapon for a more civilized time. For over a thousand generations the Jedi Knights were the most powerful, most respected force in the galaxy... The guardians of peace and justice in the Old Republic."
With those words, Obi-Wan Kenobi hinted at a grand legend, the era of the Jedi Knights.

Travel with us now to those majestic  times, 4,000 years before the birth of Luke Skywalker. Witness the deadly trials that face young Jedi Ulic Qel-Droma, and the tragedy that will turn Nomi Sunrider into one of the greatest Jedi of her time!
Then watch as Ulic Qel-Droma and Nomi Sunrider are challenged afresh by the dark times of the Freedon Nadd Uprising.
